title: ICE involving type inference during check_transmute

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Found with a [modified fuzz-rustc](https://github.com/jruderman/fuzz-rustc)

### Code

```Rust
fn foo() {
    oops;
}

unsafe fn bar() {
    std::mem::transmute::<_, *mut _>(1_u8);
}

fn main() {}
```

### ICE (nightly)

```
thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 1', /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ena-0.14.0/src/snapshot_vec.rs:199:10
```
